titles.title: State Sales Tax Equity Relief Act of 2007
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make the election to deduct State and local sales taxes permanent law.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
9/19/2007--Introduced.
State Sales Tax Equity Relief Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make permanent the taxpayer election to deduct state and local sales taxes in lieu of state and local income taxes.
